Interface com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ads.IVirtuosoAdUrlResolver
Inherited members: ShowHide
Deprecated: ShowHide
View: ClientSubclassPackageImplementation
com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ads

Interface IVirtuosoAdUrlResolver

  • public interface IVirtuosoAdUrlResolver
    IVirtuosoAdResolver can be supplied to the IClientSideAdsParserProvider to allow custom ad content to be used for specific assets Add an instance of IVirtuosoAdUrlResolver to the list provided by IClientSideAdsParserProvider prior to parsing any asset manifests that have related ad content Multiple IVirtuosoAdUrlResolvers can be provided via the IClientSideAdsParserProvider. The SDK will check the added IVirtuosoAdUrlResolvers in the order that they are listed and will return the first URL that it finds
    • Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      getAdNetworkName 
      abstract java.lang.String getAdNetworkName()
      A name or id for the ad network associated with this resolver that will be used in analytics event generation for events relating to fetching advertising content.
      java.lang.String getAdNetworkName()
      A name or id for the ad network associated with this resolver that will be used in analytics event generation for events relating to fetching advertising content.
      Returns:
      The network name to appear in the analytics events.
      getUrlForAsset 
      abstract java.net.URL getUrlForAsset(IAsset asset)
      Provide the URL for ad definitions for the provided asset, or null if this resolver cannot provide adverts.
      java.net.URL getUrlForAsset(IAsset asset) throws java.net.MalformedURLException
      Provide the URL for ad definitions for the provided asset, or null if this resolver cannot provide adverts.
      Parameters:
      asset - asset to use in generating ad content URL
      Returns:
      URL of ad content for the specified asset
      Throws:
      java.net.MalformedURLException
